magicalItems.name: Potion of Healing
magicalItems.description: Restores 2d4+2 hit points when consumed.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Greater Healing
magicalItems.description: Restores 4d4+4 hit points when consumed.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Superior Healing
magicalItems.description: Restores 8d4+8 hit points when consumed.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Supreme Healing
magicalItems.description: Restores 10d4+20 hit points when consumed.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Invisibility
magicalItems.description: Grants invisibility for 1 hour when consumed.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Flying
magicalItems.description: Grants a flying speed of 60 feet for 1 hour when consumed.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Fire Breath
magicalItems.description: Allows the user to exhale fire in a 15-foot cone for 1 hour.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Poison Resistance
magicalItems.description: Grants resistance to poison damage for 1 hour.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Water Breathing
magicalItems.description: Allows the user to breathe underwater for 1 hour.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
magicalItems.description: Allows the user to cast Animal Friendship on a beast.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Growth
magicalItems.description: Increases the user's size by one category for 1d4 hours.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Diminution
magicalItems.description: Decreases the user's size by one category for 1d4 hours.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Gaseous Form
magicalItems.description: Transforms the user into a misty cloud for up to 1 hour.

magicalItems.name: Potion of Speed
magicalItems.description: Grants the effects of the Haste spell for 1 minute.

magicalItems.name: Scroll of Magic Missile
magicalItems.description: A scroll containing the Magic Missile spell.

magicalItems.name: Scroll of Fireball
magicalItems.description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell.

magicalItems.name: Scroll of Identify
magicalItems.description: A scroll containing the Identify spell.

magicalItems.name: Scroll of Revivify
magicalItems.description: A scroll containing the Revivify spell.

magicalItems.name: Scroll of Teleport
magicalItems.description: A scroll containing the Teleport spell.

magicalItems.name: Scroll of Wish
magicalItems.description: A scroll containing the Wish spell.

magicalItems.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
magicalItems.description: A wand that can cast Magic Missile without using a spell slot.

magicalItems.name: Wand of Web
magicalItems.description: A wand that can cast Web without using a spell slot.

magicalItems.name: Wand of Fireballs
magicalItems.description: A wand that can cast Fireball without using a spell slot.

magicalItems.name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
magicalItems.description: A wand that can cast Lightning Bolt without using a spell slot.

magicalItems.name: Wand of Paralysis
magicalItems.description: A wand that can paralyze a target without using a spell slot.

magicalItems.name: Wand of Wonder
magicalItems.description: A wand that produces unpredictable magical effects.

magicalItems.name: Ring of Protection
magicalItems.description: Grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

magicalItems.name: Ring of Resistance
magicalItems.description: Grants resistance to one type of damage.

magicalItems.name: Ring of Spell Storing
magicalItems.description: Can store up to 5 levels of spells for later use.

magicalItems.name: Ring of Invisibility
magicalItems.description: Grants invisibility while worn.

magicalItems.name: Ring of Regeneration
magicalItems.description: Regenerates 1d6 hit points every 10 minutes.

magicalItems.name: Ring of Three Wishes
magicalItems.description: Grants three wishes to the wearer.

magicalItems.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
magicalItems.description: Grants advantage on Stealth checks.

magicalItems.name: Cloak of Protection
magicalItems.description: Grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

magicalItems.name: Cloak of Displacement
magicalItems.description: Makes the wearer appear to be standing in a different location.

magicalItems.name: Cloak of the Bat
magicalItems.description: Grants various bat-like abilities to the wearer.

magicalItems.name: Bag of Holding
magicalItems.description: A bag that can hold up to 500 pounds of items in an extradimensional space.

magicalItems.name: Boots of Elvenkind
magicalItems.description: Makes the wearer's steps silent.

magicalItems.name: Boots of Speed
magicalItems.description: Doubles the wearer's walking speed.

magicalItems.name: Boots of Striding and Springing
magicalItems.description: Triples the wearer's jumping distance.

magicalItems.name: Bracers of Archery
magicalItems.description: Grants proficiency with longbows and shortbows and a +2 bonus to damage rolls.

magicalItems.name: Bracers of Defense
magicalItems.description: Grants a +2 bonus to AC if not wearing armor or using a shield.

magicalItems.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
magicalItems.description: Sets the wearer's Strength score to 19.

magicalItems.name: Gloves of Thievery
magicalItems.description: Grants a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks and Dexterity checks to pick locks.

magicalItems.name: Hat of Disguise
magicalItems.description: Allows the wearer to cast Disguise Self at will.

magicalItems.name: Headband of Intellect
magicalItems.description: Sets the wearer's Intelligence score to 19.

magicalItems.name: Helm of Telepathy
magicalItems.description: Allows the wearer to cast Detect Thoughts and communicate telepathically.

magicalItems.name: Amulet of Health
magicalItems.description: Sets the wearer's Constitution score to 19.

magicalItems.name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
magicalItems.description: Hides the wearer from divination magic.

magicalItems.name: Broom of Flying
magicalItems.description: A broom that can fly at a speed of 50 feet.

magicalItems.name: Carpet of Flying
magicalItems.description: A carpet that can fly and carry up to 800 pounds.

magicalItems.name: Deck of Illusions
magicalItems.description: A deck of cards that creates illusions when drawn.

magicalItems.name: Eversmoking Bottle
magicalItems.description: A bottle that releases thick smoke when opened.

magicalItems.name: Eyes of Charming
magicalItems.description: Allows the wearer to cast Charm Person.

magicalItems.name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
magicalItems.description: Grants advantage on Investigation checks that rely on sight.

magicalItems.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
magicalItems.description: A statuette that can transform into a creature.

magicalItems.name: Immovable Rod
magicalItems.description: A rod that can be fixed in place with a button press.

magicalItems.name: Lantern of Revealing
magicalItems.description: A lantern that reveals invisible creatures and objects.

magicalItems.name: Pipes of Haunting
magicalItems.description: Pipes that create frightening sounds when played.

magicalItems.name: Rope of Climbing
magicalItems.description: A 60-foot length of silk rope that can move on its own.

magicalItems.name: Staff of the Python
magicalItems.description: A staff that can transform into a giant constrictor snake.

magicalItems.name: Staff of Healing
magicalItems.description: A staff that can cast various healing spells.

magicalItems.name: Staff of Fire
magicalItems.description: A staff that can cast various fire spells.

magicalItems.name: Staff of Frost
magicalItems.description: A staff that can cast various cold spells.

magicalItems.name: Staff of Power
magicalItems.description: A staff that grants various offensive and defensive abilities.

magicalItems.name: Staff of the Magi
magicalItems.description: A powerful staff with numerous magical abilities.

magicalItems.name: Sword of Sharpness
magicalItems.description: A magic sword that deals extra slashing damage and can sever limbs.

magicalItems.name: Sword of Life Stealing
magicalItems.description: A magic sword that steals life force from enemies.

magicalItems.name: Flame Tongue
magicalItems.description: A magic sword that can burst into flames.

magicalItems.name: Frost Brand
magicalItems.description: A magic sword that deals extra cold damage.

magicalItems.name: Dagger of Venom
magicalItems.description: A magic dagger that can poison enemies.

magicalItems.name: Mace of Disruption
magicalItems.description: A magic mace that is deadly to undead.

magicalItems.name: Mace of Smiting
magicalItems.description: A magic mace that is especially effective against constructs.

magicalItems.name: Mace of Terror
magicalItems.description: A magic mace that can frighten enemies.

magicalItems.name: Hammer of Thunderbolts
magicalItems.description: A powerful magic hammer that can strike with the force of a thunderbolt.

magicalItems.name: Oathbow
magicalItems.description: A magic longbow that is deadly against a chosen enemy.

magicalItems.name: Armor of Resistance
magicalItems.description: Armor that grants resistance to one type of damage.

magicalItems.name: Armor of Vulnerability
magicalItems.description: Armor that grants resistance to some damage types but vulnerability to others.

magicalItems.name: Armor of Invulnerability
magicalItems.description: Armor that can make the wearer immune to nonmagical damage.

magicalItems.name: Elven Chain
magicalItems.description: Chain mail that doesn't impose disadvantage on Stealth checks.

magicalItems.name: Mithral Armor
magicalItems.description: Armor made of mithral, which is lighter than normal metal.

magicalItems.name: Adamantine Armor
magicalItems.description: Armor made of adamantine, which prevents critical hits.

magicalItems.name: Shield of Missile Attraction
magicalItems.description: A cursed shield that attracts ranged weapon attacks.

magicalItems.name: Shield of Expression
magicalItems.description: A shield with a face that can change expressions.

magicalItems.name: Spellguard Shield
magicalItems.description: A shield that grants advantage on saving throws against spells.

magicalItems.name: Arrow-Catching Shield
magicalItems.description: A shield that provides extra protection against ranged attacks.

magicalItems.name: Sentinel Shield
magicalItems.description: A shield that grants advantage on initiative rolls and Perception checks.

shopkeeperQuirks: Speaks in rhymes
Has a pet familiar that helps around the shop
Collects unusual trinkets from customers
Claims all items have a story (and will tell it at length)
Constantly rearranges the shop's inventory
Insists on bartering rather than fixed prices
Believes certain items are cursed (they're not)
Only conducts business during certain phases of the moon
Offers tea to every customer
Sneezes when handling magical items
Gives unsolicited advice with every purchase
Refuses to sell items to certain races or classes
Tests items on customers before selling
Speaks to the items as if they're alive
Wears outlandish, color-changing robes
Claims to be hundreds of years old
Insists on knowing what the item will be used for
Adds 'magical' properties to mundane items
Forgets prices and makes them up on the spot
Trades in exotic currencies only
shopAtmospheres: Cluttered with items stacked to the ceiling
Meticulously organized with labeled shelves
Dimly lit with magical floating lights
Filled with strange smells and occasional puffs of smoke
Unnaturally quiet, sounds seem muffled
Items occasionally move on their own
Temperature changes in different areas of the shop
Larger on the inside than it appears from outside
Constantly shifting layout that seems to change when not looking
Filled with the sound of ticking clocks
Magical illusions display item demonstrations
Plants and vines grow throughout the shop
Partially open to the elements with a garden inside
Decorated with artifacts from ancient civilizations
Populated by small magical constructs that assist customers
Filled with bubbling potions and alchemical equipment
Books and scrolls float through the air to shelve themselves
Enchanted mirrors show customers using various items
Seemingly normal but with subtle magical effects
Different sections exist in different elemental planes
shopSpecialties: Items recovered from dungeons and ruins
